@loveheart: Are you? Or is it just some big, fat troll-talk? You see, there already was a man who promised such prospects, but in the end, he only delivered fifteen seconds of a "codec error" video and got himself banned. Prove your true intentions.

( for Rooted users / Offline)

1.Download apk for rooted & Install
2. Download data, Copy 'com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftKRHM' folder to 'sdcard/Android /obb'
3. Copy Titaniumbackup files to Titaniumbackup folder and Restore 'Data only' with Titanium backup
4. Launch the Game

for unrooted users (moto artix 4g tested)

1. log in your goole play and open backgroud data & turn on your GPRS/3G/WIFI

Download data
, Copy 'com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftKRHM' folder to 'sdcard/Android /obb'

Download apk for unrooted
